thread.title: Twitter roasted Cam Newton during his Buick ad
thread.title_full: Twitter roasted Cam Newton during his Buick ad

title: Twitter roasted Cam Newton during his Buick ad
text:
Twitter roasted Cam Newton during his Buick ad Cam Newton finally threw a TD pass in the Super Bowl. Post to Facebook Twitter roasted Cam Newton during his Buick ad Cam Newton finally threw a TD pass in the Super Bowl.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/twitter-cam-newton-buick-commercial-jokes-super-bowl-51-falcons-patriots-nfl/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Twitter roasted Cam Newton during his Buick ad Andrew Joseph 7:46 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
One of the better commercials from the first half of Super Bowl 51 came from Cam Newton's appearance in a Buick commercial. 
The ad was set during a pee-wee football game, and some kid morphed into Newton. He obviously dominated against all the much smaller football players. But with Newton's rough Super Bowl 50 still fresh in the football world's mind, Twitter roasted Newton again. 
But many were still fans of the commercial. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/twitter-cam-newton-buick-commercial-jokes-super-bowl-51-falcons-patriots-nfl/ Most Popular
